definition: to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc

sentences.english: Who often dust the sideboard in the morning?
sentences.chinese: 誰常常早上擦抹餐具櫃？

sentences.english: Avoid spending a lot of time erasing.
Rub the product over all surfaces of hands and fingers until hands are dry.
sentences.chinese: 把產品擦抹到手和手指所有表面，直到手幹。

definition: to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
to apply (ointment, powder)/to smear/to paint on
to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
to swab/to wipe up with a mop
